crystals.name: Flourite
crystals.description: The stone for creating a path to your future, draws out negative energies and stress while stimulating memory and learning skills.

crystals.name: Citrine
crystals.description: The stone for finding your power to attract prosperity and unlock your soul, the happy stone that brights up any energy to light up aspects in your.

crystals.name: Amethyst
crystals.description: The stone for natural stress relief and cleansing negative energy , brings peace, stability, courage, and strength, helps balance mood swings while encouraging honesty and self control.

crystals.name: Rose Quartz
crystals.description: Rose quartz - the stone for universal love, such as self love, family, platonic, romantic, and unconditional, promotes peace and confidence, heals the heart from any emotional stress.

crystals.name: Labradorite
crystals.description: The stone of transformation helps you overcome fears and insecurities to bring excitement and adventure while being protected from negative energy.

crystals.name: Clear Quartz
crystals.description: The stone of healing, the best energy amplifier and healer, it improves quality in life by making you feel happier and reenergized while bringing your body back into balance.

crystals.name: Opal
crystals.description: The stone of inspiration, enhances creativity and imagination, brings hope and inner peace, enhances memory while decreasing confusion.

crystals.name: Obsidian
crystals.description: Obsidian the stone of protection, releases resentment, fear, and anger, absorbs negative energies while cutting cords that stop us from moving on, brings clarity.

crystals.name: Smokey Quartz
crystals.description: The stone of endurance, detoxifies your aura while relieving tension, stress, and anxiety, also wards off negative energy.

crystals.name: Ocean Jasper
crystals.description: The uplifting stone, brings joy and happiness, helps you relieve negative energies or feelings to make you more optimistic and confident.

crystals.name: 7 Chakras
crystals.description:
1. Root Chakra - Red Jasper - stability
  2. Sacral Chakra - Red Carnelian - absorption
  3. Solar Plexus Chakra - Yellow Aventurine - prosperity
  4. Heart Chakra - Green Aventurine - comfort
  5. Throat Chakra - Lapis Lazuli - strength
  6. Third Eye Chakra - Blue Aventurine - intuition
  7. Crown Chakra – Amethyst - reliever

testimonials.author: @beyaangobung
testimonials.review: 100% top quality crystals. I love how they interact with their followers and make sure that they get the best experience when picking out their crystals.

testimonials.author: @badgyaldesi
testimonials.review: Connie & Jacob have the best quality crystals!! They have affordable pricing by including bundles or gift sets. They also include shipping and have awesome customer service.

testimonials.author: @anniebanannie_16
testimonials.review: Beautiful crystals at an absolutely affordable price. Plus great customer service. Love love love crystalsbyus. ❤️
